frase1: Zero issues with that. I'm capable of communicating clearly and objectively, expressing my ideas effectively in both formal and informal interactions.
frase2: I can adapt to new and dynamic environments, learning new technologies, being receptive to feedback, and adjusting as needed according to the project's requirements. It's my favorite part.
frase3: High five! I love engaging in conversations, sharing ideas, and listening to other perspectives, and that's why I get along so well with UI/UX, QA teams, among others.
